snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Wednesday's selection includes video from inside a Foxconn factory in China, using virtual reality to imagine ourselves in the future and a...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Wednesday's selection includes video from inside a Foxconn factory in China, using virtual reality to imagine ourselves in the future and a proposed telecommunication service intended to ensure its users' privacy.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Female Founders and Internet Freedom
